sentence: The Saturday event had Arizona state Representative Mark Finchem address the audience as a "special guest speaker."

sentence: Among the Republicans who attended John Sabal's Patriot Voice event, were Arizona State Senator Wendy Rogers and Arizona State Representative Mark Finchem, both of whom continue to push the baseless claim that the 2020 election was stolen.
